pr_title: Sb BinaryData - Binary representation of data from different sources

timeline.bodyText: Should we clone this? In other APIs we usually make a copy of the byte[].
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Once this moves into azure-core we have a specialized ByteArrayOutputStream type that allows access to its internal buffer without copying when toByteArray is called.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: yes we can do this when we move it azure-core
replies.author: hemanttanwar

timeline.bodyText: Given this class only has static utility methods it should be fine to use a static logger and suppress the Checkstyle rule.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: This ctor is not required. If a ctor with args is defined then automatically no-args ctor will be disabled unless explicitly added.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: For methods that return Mono/Flux, use the error channel instead of throwing exception.
timeline.author: srnagar
